title: Calories in Whopper Jr
meta_description: Learn calories in Whopper Jr from Burger King, plus carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and full nutrition details for this fast-food burger.
assumptions: Standard Burger King Whopper Jr: flame-grilled beef patty, sesame seed bun, ketchup, mayonnaise, pickles, onions, lettuce, tomato. No cheese or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard U.S. Burger King data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Whopper Jr provides ~310 kcal, 15 g protein, and 27 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Whopper Jr?
faqs.a: Approximately 310 calories for one standard Whopper Jr.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Whopper Jr?
faqs.a: About 15 g of protein per Whopper Jr.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper Jr?
faqs.a: Around 570 mg of sodium, mainly from the bun and condiments.

faqs.q: Does Whopper Jr have trans fats?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g trans fat per burger from the beef and bun.

faqs.q: Calories in Whopper Jr vs. regular Whopper?
faqs.a: Whopper Jr has 310 kcal; regular Whopper has ~670 kcal due to larger patty and bun.
